title: New: Los Porcos – Do You Wanna Live? / Jesus Luvs U Baby
content:
Reportedly featuring members of WU LYF (Tom, Joseph and Evans) alongside members of FAMY and Profondo, Los Porcos are resoundingly upbeat.

Their debut tracks, Do You Wanna Live? and Jesus Luvs U Baby are 70’s throwbacks, with echo’s of classic early 00’s R&B; it’s funky and despite the general tongue in cheek feel of the whole thing, it’s undoubtedly a match made in heaven. Almost gleeful sounding, it’s insincere in an Ariel Pink, Mac DeMarco manner, and you know what, it’s bloody fantastic. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
